death.attack.erase.player: %1$s was turned into eraser crumbs by %2$s
item.eraser.null_ingot.desc: A strangely soft ingot that no one really understands, but it looks powerful.
item.eraser.eraser_item.desc: Kind of like a soft sword-looking thing.
item.eraser.world_destroyer.desc: Grandpa, didn't you already have your snack?
item.eraser.eraser_eraser.desc: Huh? Grammar’s off? Well, I ain’t a native speaker, so I wouldn’t know.
